experiences.name: SpringGem Weather Information
bullets: Used Django and PostgreSQL to build features of a road conditions forecasting webapp for Montana, Michigan, and Georgia Departments of Transportation
Analyzed data from 1000+ NOAA weather stations with the Numpy data science stack
Worked with Dr. Menglin S. Jin under the University of Maryland's Atmospheric Sciences Department to film and edit promotional videos for LinkedIn and YouTube

experiences.name: Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation
bullets: Led a team of 4 interns on the UX CoE team to redesign and redevelop the UI of an enterprise risk reporting dashboard with Angular and Sass
Adhered to strict Agile/SCRUM workflow with bi-weekly sprints and daily standups
Prototyped ideas by conducting user interviews, journey mapping, and modeling features with Axure RP
Thoroughly documented projects with JIRA and managed codebase with BitBucket and Nexus Repository
experiences.read_more: It was a rat's nest. Not a literal one, but that is what her hair seemed to resemble every morning when she got up. It was going to take at least an hour to get it under control and she was sick and tired of it. She peered into the mirror and wondered if it was worth it. It wasn't. She opened the drawer and picked up the hair clippers.\nDo you really listen when you are talking with someone? I have a friend who listens in an unforgiving way. She actually takes every word you say as being something important and when you have a friend that listens like that, words take on a whole new meaning.\nDave watched as the forest burned up on the hill, only a few miles from her house. The car had been hastily packed and Marta was inside trying to round up the last of the pets. Dave went through his mental list of the most important papers and documents that they couldn't leave behind. He scolded himself for not having prepared these better in advance and hoped that he had remembered everything that was needed. He continued to wait for Marta to appear with the pets, but she still was nowhere to be seen.

experiences.name: University of Maryland Division of IT
bullets: Worked with a team of 7 to provide hardware and software support for University of Maryland desktops and laptops
Responsible for installing, updating, and troubleshooting computers' OS and drivers with PowerShell and UEFI
